SEARCH
Package com.sc2002.model

Class HDBOfficerModel

java.lang.Object
com.sc2002.model.UserModel
com.sc2002.model.ApplicantModel
com.sc2002.model.HDBOfficerModel
public class HDBOfficerModel extends ApplicantModel
Represents an HDB Officer user in the BTO Management System. Extends ApplicantModel (consider if extending UserModel directly is more appropriate) and provides officer-specific functionalities and menu options. Officers manage specific projects and handle applications/enquiries related to them.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private FlatType
    bookedFlatType
    The type of flat booked by the officer (if they applied as an applicant).
    private BTOProjectModel
    bookedProject
    The BTO project object the officer has booked a flat in (if they applied as an applicant).
    private int
    projectID
    The ID of the project this officer is currently assigned to manage.
    private boolean
    registrationStatus
    Status indicating if the officer is actively registered to manage a project.

  • Constructor Details

    • HDBOfficerModel

      public HDBOfficerModel(String name, String nric, int age, String isMarried, String password)
      Constructs a new HDBOfficerModel instance. Initializes the officer using the superclass constructor and sets the role to HDB_OFFICER.
      Parameters:
      name - The officer's full name.
      nric - The officer's NRIC.
      age - The officer's age.
      isMarried - A string indicating marital status ("Married" or "Single").
      password - The officer's chosen plain text password.

  • Method Details

    • setProjectID

      public void setProjectID(int projectID)
      Sets the ID of the project this officer is assigned to manage.
      Parameters:
      projectID - The project ID to set.

    • getProjectID

      public int getProjectID()
      Gets the ID of the project this officer is currently assigned to manage.
      Returns:
      The project ID.

    • getRegistrationStatus

      public boolean getRegistrationStatus()
      Gets the registration status of the officer for managing a project.
      Returns:
      True if registered, false otherwise.

    • getMenuOptions

      public List<String> getMenuOptions()
      Retrieves the menu options available to the HDB Officer. Inherits options from ApplicantModel and adds officer-specific options.
      Overrides:
      getMenuOptions in class ApplicantModel
      Returns:
      A list of menu options for the officer.
